summary:
Adds a summon spell for every creature in the game. I couldn't find a good enough mod so I just made one that works the best. I also modded the final conjuration perk to be able to summon more than just 2 creatures.
THIS MOD REQUIRES ALL DLC
descriptionHtml:
Adds a summon spell for every creature in the game.  I couldn't find a good enough mod so I just made one that works the best.  I also modded the final conjuration perk to be able to summon more than just 2 creatures. THIS MOD REQUIRES ALL DLC

Visit the college of Winterhold library to find the Master Wizard and buy spells.

If you wish to view pictures or want more info, my better upload is on Steam workshop.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6lC-9VEbes
author: Tyler Clifton
